about_the_game:
Get your players’ blood pumping with MUSE FANTASIA Battle Music Vol. 1! CarrotWine has crafted a pack with 17 BGMs focused on battles, with high energy tunes to keep you on your toes during a fight.

4 different songs for normal battles give you options to keep battles from feeling stale, with one focusing more on electric riffs and another perfect for facing off against fantasy creatures with cheerful flute playing. For your deadly boss battles, make sure to pick the tunes that stress the danger with racing melodies and dramatic beats. This pack also has a few songs for those rare moments your heroes get to relax in a town’s tavern, with slow piano chords perfect for the end of the day or chipper strings to celebrate making it back to town in one piece!

Also included are 14 MEs to make sure even the ends of your battles sound awesome. Use one of the upbeat fanfares when you level up or win the battle, or let your players know just how bad their loss was with slow and melancholic MEs.

So get ready to give your battles some upbeat tunes with MUSE FANTASIA Battle Music Vol. 1 today!

Features:

* BGM: 17 songs
* 14 ME
* Files come in ogg and m4a formats

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

4 different songs for normal battles give you options to keep battles from feeling stale, with one focusing more on electric riffs and another perfect for facing off against fantasy creatures with cheerful flute playing. For your deadly boss battles, make sure to pick the tunes that stress the danger with racing melodies and dramatic beats. This pack also has a few songs for those rare moments your heroes get to relax in a town’s tavern, with slow piano chords perfect for the end of the day or chipper strings to celebrate making it back to town in one piece!

Also included are 14 MEs to make sure even the ends of your battles sound awesome. Use one of the upbeat fanfares when you level up or win the battle, or let your players know just how bad their loss was with slow and melancholic MEs.

So get ready to give your battles some upbeat tunes with MUSE FANTASIA Battle Music Vol. 1 today!
